<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Gilded Gunner Assassin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1974)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +15

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Concealed Holster](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1202), [Dueling Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201) (10 rounds), [_golden silencer_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1585) (affixed to dueling pistol), [Knuckle Duster](/Weapons.aspx?ID=185), [moderate thunderstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Shot of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirements** The Gilded Gunner has a loaded firearm in hand; **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet uses a [manipulate](/Actions.aspx?ID=639) action, uses a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action, or makes a ranged attack; **Effect** The Gilded Gunner makes a ranged Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the Gilded Gunner disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the Gilded Gunner's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
knuckle duster +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Free-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thunderstone +15 ([Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6), [Bomb](/Traits.aspx?ID=21), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d4 sonic damage plus 2 sonic [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) and [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) (DC 20)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dueling pistol +15 ([Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The Gilded Gunner assassin deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Gilded Gunner Assassin
